tool_description: This API gets Specrom's Domain Rank and Authority using batch requests (upto 1000 domains per request)
name: Domain Rank and Authority
title: Domain Rank and Authority

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Get Specrom's domain rank and authority for upto 1000 domains per request.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://domain-rank-and-authority.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "domain-rank-and-authority.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://domain-rank-and-authority.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "domain-rank-and-authority.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
